pageContext.claim: “Alliances are very easy. But, you know, our alliances have taken advantage of us. If you look at how much money we spent on NATO and how much money countries from Europe -- who are really a much bigger beneficiary that we are, okay? You know, they're there and we're here.”
pageContext.analysis: Building long-lasting alliances is actually very difficult, especially if a nation breaks commitments as Trump did with the Kurdish forces. It's impossible to put a monetary value on the NATO alliance, as Trump suggests.
